snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight - Batman v Superman Batmobile & Skin Pack (Free Roam Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight "2016 Batman v Superman Batmobile Pack": free roam gameplay and Ben Affleck Batsuit skin -  Video available in Full HD (1080p)

The 2016 Batman v Superman Batmobile can be used in free roam only once you've cleared the streets of the drones tanks. There's no Battle Mode for this Batmobile, that means you can't start missions that involve tank battles or use the car during the story.

===================================

Game available on: Sony PlayStation 4, Microsoft Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Xbox One

===================================

Follow BatmanArkhamVideos on:
● YouTube - http://www.youtube.com/BatmanArkhamVideos
● Twitter- http://www.twitter.com/ArkhamVideos
● Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BatmanArkhamNews

For more info and videos, visit http://www.Batman-Arkham.com and http://www.Games-Series.com
